title: China declares formal opening of huge new Beijing airport
text:
China declares formal opening of huge new Beijing airport

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 12:27AM ET)

© Reuters. Chinese President Xi Jinping attends the launching ceremony for the new Daxing International Airport at its terminal hall ahead of the 70th founding anniversary of the People's Republic of China in Beijing BEIJING (Reuters) - Beijing's huge new airport, Daxing International, is formally open, President Xi Jinping said on Wednesday, ahead of the 70th anniversary of the People's Republic of China. The phoenix-shaped airport, located in the south of the capital, will help relieve pressure on the existing Capital International Airport in Beijing's northeast, where capacity constraints often cause flight delays.
